title: Anthony Albanese to Meet With Japanese Counterpart
description: (L–R) U.S. President Joe Biden, Australia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese, Japan's Prime Minister Fumio Kishida, and India's Prime Minister Narendra Modi hold a Quad meeting on the sidelines of the G–7 summit, at the Grand Prince Hotel in Hiroshima, western Japan, on May 20, 2023. (Jonathan Ernst/Pool Photo via AP)

title: Biden Says Newsom ‘Could Have the Job I’m Looking For’
